oai_dc:dc.dc:title: Dr. Boyd, in dentist office
oai_dc:dc.dc:creator: Browder, B.B.
oai_dc:dc.dc:subject: Achieving Recognition
Medical profession
African Americans; Dentists
oai_dc:dc.dc:description: Man in suit, seated next to dentist's chair, "Dr. Boyd Dentist" visible in reverse on glass door to his left. Signed "B.B.Browder, Knoxville, Tn" at lower right.
Doctor C.S. Boyd had a dental practice on West Vine Street in Knoxville in the early decades of the twentieth century. He is pictured here beside his dental chair.
oai_dc:dc.dc:relation: Dr. Boyd, in dentist office, African American Photography Collection, MS.2129. University of Tennessee, Knoxville - Libraries
